document_data.name: A Merchant's Sagacity
document_data.author: [[Blackthorn Belgadar]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''A Merchant's Sagacity''''' was a [[book]] written by the merchant [[Blackthorn Belgadar]].{{Cite dragon/272/The New Adventures of Volo: Quotations of the Realms}}{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}

The original copy was kept in [[Candlekeep]] as well as the [[Leaves of Learning]] library, around the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.{{Cite web enhancement/The Leaves of Learning}}
document_data.Contents:
Within the book, Belgadar sarcastically wrote how books were great resources for individuals to learn about the mistakes of others' in order to make more profound mistakes of their own.

He mused about the doom that resided within individuals and how it waited for the precise moment to present itself.
